For Part 1 of Writing Bits

01110011011101000111010101100100011110010010000001101000011000010111001001100100


For Part 2

The full sequence
01101000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111

One bit chopped off
01101000 01100101 01101100 01101100 0110111


For Part 3

[87, 101, 32, 97, 114, 101, 32, 116, 104, 101, 32, 66, 111, 114, 103, 46, 10, 82, 101, 115, 105, 115, 116, 97, 110, 99, 101, 32, 105, 115, 32, 102, 117, 116, 105, 108, 101, 33, 10]
